record.title: REPEALING CERTAIN SECTIONS OF THE ACT OF MAY 26, 1936, PERTAINING TO THE VIRGIN ISLANDS

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to the immediate consideration of Calendar No. 44, H.R. 57.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title.
record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate proceeded to consider the bill.

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that the bill be read three times, passed, the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table, and any statements relating to the bill be printed in the Record.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
